text: Memoirs of an Invisible Man is a 1992 comedy and suspense movie. It is about an invisible man. Chevy Chase plays the invisible man. Daryl Hannah plays Alice Monroe. This movie received negative reviews from the critics. It performed poorly at the box office. Category:1992 thriller movies Category:1992 comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: Memoirs of an Invisible Man
